channel.title: RuneAdventure - The Adventure Starts Here
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GvM7v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][size=20pt][URL=http://"http://runeadventure.com/index/webclient.php"][B]Webclient[/B][/URL][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][size=20pt][URL=http://"http://runeadventure.com/"][B]Forums[/B][/URL][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/play.gif[/img][size=20pt][URL=http://"http://runeadventure.com/client.jar"][B]Download Client[/B][/URL][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q9J9N.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oQjIZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Combat[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]99% Accurate Maximum Melee Damage Formula [*]99% Accurate Maximum Range Damage Formula [*]99% Accurate Maximum Magic Damage Formula [*]Clipped Projectiles [*]Clipped Combat Following [*]Cannot attack through walls [*]No diagonal attacking with melee [*]Npcs will not attack diagonally if the player is ranging/maging [*]99% Accurate Accuracy Formula [*]99% Accurate Defence Formula [*]Barrage spells and Chinchompas hit opponents in a 3x3 square [*]Multi-Combat Areas [*]Working special attacks [*]100% Accurate Weapon/Armor Bonuses[/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Cooking[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Cooking Gauntlets [*]All Fish [*]Enoug Foods [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Crafting[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Leather [*]Dragonhide Leather [*]Jewelry [*]Spinning [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Farming[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Obtaining Seeds [*]Farming Tools [*]Farming Plots [*]Preparing Plots [*]Growing Your Crops [*]Protecting Your Plants [*]Produce Containers [*]Other Events & Items [*]Herb Allotments [*]Fruit/Vegetable Allotments [*]Tree/Bush Allotments [*]Compost Bin[/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Firemaking[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]All Obtainable Logs [*]Fire removing/global [*]Using tinderbox --> Dropped Logs and ItemOnGroundItem2 packet [*]Colorful Fires [*]Clipped Autowalk [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Fishing[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Fishing Gear [*]Catching Fish [*]Fishing Guild [*]Random Events [*]Moving fishing spots [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Fletching[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Fletching Arrows [*]Fletching Bows [*]Fletching Darts [*]Fletching Crossbows [*]Bolts [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Herblore[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Obtaining Herbs [*]Obtaining Vials [*]Creating Potions [*]Cleaning Herbs [*]All Ingredients [*]All Potions [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231407/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Hunter[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Hunting Equipment [*]Birds [*]Deadfall Traps [*]Box Traps [*]Net Traps [*]Pitfall Traps [*]Imps [*]Hunter Clothing [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Mining[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]All Ores [*]Granite [*]Sandstone [*]Obtaining Gems [*]Pickaxe Requirements [*]Rune Essence [*]Exploding rocks [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220331/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Prayer[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Bone burying [*]Protect Prayers [*]Prayers [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Runecrafting[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Runecrafting Pouches [*]Runecrafting Altars [*]Abyss [*]Crafting Runes [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Slayer[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Low level Tasks [*]Medium level Tasks [*]High level Tasks [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Smithing[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Smelting Ores [*]Superheating [*]Smithing Steel [*]Smithing Mithril [*]Smithing Adamant [*]Smithing Rune [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122201602/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Thieving[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Picking Pockets (All npcs & Correct Items) [*]Looting Market Stalls [*]Disarming Traps/Lockpicking doors [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122222711/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Woodcutting[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Enough Trees [*]All Axes [*]Helpful Equipment [*]Bird Nests [*]Re-written[/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111124170261/runescape/images/c/c0/Quest.png[/img][size=15pt][B]Quests[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]New Quest System [*]Custom Quests[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Random Events[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Genie [*]Swarm [*]Drill Demon [*]Flying Pickaxe heads [*]Flying Axe heads [*]Evil Chicken [*]Freaky Forester [*]River Troll [*]Rock Golem [*]Spirit Tree [*]Zombie [*]Ents[/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kuF3c.png[/img]
[size=15pt][B]Duel Arena[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Dueling count down [*]Staking[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Castle Wars[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Catapult [*]Bandages [*]Underground [list] [*]Mining rocks [*]Exploding rocks [*]Collapsing passages [/list] [*]Climbing over walls [*]Lock picking doors [*]Flags [*]Interfaces [*]Attacking players[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Pest Control [/b][/size]
[ul][*]Npcs [*]Npcs attacking void knight [*]Portals[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Fight Caves[/b][/size]
[ul][*]63 waves [*]Correct Npcs [*]Jad using multiple attacks[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Fight Pits[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Lobby [*]Attacking players [*]Champion[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Barrows [/b][/size]
[ul][*]Digging [*]Barrows brothers spawning [*]Hidden tunnel[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Mage Arena [/b][/size]
[ul][*]Kolodian changes forms [*]Ability to get a god cape upon completion[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Team Deathmatch[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Teams [*]Lobby [*]Kills logged[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Rogue's Den[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Requirements [*]Maze [*]Chest at the end [*]Traps[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Ranging Guild[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Tickets [*]Shooting the target [*]Interface[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Free For All PK [/b][/size]
[ul][*]Attacking players [*]Lobby[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Fun PK [/b][/size]
[ul][*]Attacking players [*]Can only attack players in Fun PK [*]Respawn in a designated area[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Tag[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Interface [*]Random player is "it" every 5 minutes[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Survival[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Lobby [*]Interface [*]Zombies spawning [*]Points[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Warrior's Guild[/b][/size]
[ul][*]All minigames[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Assault[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Temporary "kill for points" minigame [*]Real minigame[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Bounty Hunter[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Assigns a random target [*]If your target is in a safe area for too long, you get a new one. If they log out for 10 minutes you get a new target. [*]There are certain items that are not allowed [*]Hint icons to help you find your target [*]Found a good place for Bounty Hunter [*]EP and drops based on EP. You won't get[/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B2Bip.png[/img] [size=15pt][B]Transportation[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Teletabs [*]Boat Sailing [*]Obelsisks [*]Ectophial[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Auth Code Vote System[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Auth codes [*]Uses PHP XML file to store codes, codes are hashed with MD5 [*]Server loads and parses the php URL and confirms if the code is expired/used/correct [*]Code is marked as used once used [*]Players get rewards depending on what they chose as a reward [*]Codes expire if not used for a certain amount of time [*]Fully tested for bugs[/ul]
[size=15pt][B](Daily) Challenge System[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Changes daily [*]Different rewards [*]Challenges are based on your skill levels [*]Different types of challenges [*]Interface to check your challenges and completion [*]Fully tested for bugs[/ul]
[size=15pt][B]Pictures:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CK3JF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K12HU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UCooD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KWSWc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X09lO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X2QlZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/POWh4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KOqjd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SnfpX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tu3JX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DyNY5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UXb8P.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L7dLc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bFwqo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hb9pE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3iQzg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sQ8BU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8sjO4.png[/img] [/CENTER]

[]Uses PHP XML file to store codes, codes are hashed with MD5

[]Code is marked as used once used

[]Codes expire if not used for a certain amount of time
[*]Fully tested for bugs[/ul]

[ul][]Changes daily
[]Different rewards
[]Challenges are based on your skill levels
[]Different types of challenges
[]Interface to check your challenges and completion
[]Fully tested for bugs[/ul]
